thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Quality Systems Q3 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.15

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Quality Systems Q3 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.15
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Quality Systems Inc:
* QUALITY SYSTEMS, INC. REPORTS FISCAL 2018 THIRD QUARTER RESULTS
* Q3 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.15 * Q3 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.02 * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.15 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q3 REVENUE $131.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $130.6 MILLION
* ‍FOR FISCAL YEAR 2018, COMPANY IS REITERATING ITS REVENUE OUTLOOK OF A RANGE OF $522 MILLION TO $530 MILLION​
* ‍COMPANY IS ALSO REITERATING ITS NON-GAAP EPS FROM A RANGE OF $0.64 AND $0.68 FOR FY18​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
